name: Forgotten Directions
description:
Basic setup/functions of the idea I had for GMTK Game Jam 2020.
Didn't have the time/focus to get back to and finish my idea but it is playable.

Character moves automatically till it hits a wall, WASD keys are the default but a direction key is changed to another random letter when hit by a hazard.
Hit the buttons as indicated for the game to end.
